title: #181: WTAF In The UK | Gareth Icke & Rich Willett
description:
The United Kingdom is just as screwed up as America these days, it’s just that they have a different flavor for their insanity.

The co-hosts of the hilarious podcast WTAF on Ickonic, Gareth Icke & Richard Willett, stop by to fill us in on the details of what they are experiencing with vaxxx passports, idiotic restriction, never-ending double standards, and the endless lies.
